name: residingfar
label::English: Does the household have any family members residing in a different distritct?
hint::English: Fragmented refers to household members that do not live with the main family, but are NOT adult members that have left home to marry/seek work. If refers to mothers or fathers or children being separated from the rest of the household with a plan to reunite.

label::English: If yes, how many household members?

constraint_message::English: It is not possible to enter more people separated under the age of 16 than have separated

name: hhsaving
label::English: What is the total household savings in AFN at the time of interview?
hint::English:
Please note - amount should be reasonable for HH savings in AFN for a month. If you think the amount is very high or very low, check with the participant. 

If no savings, put 0

name: prioritynfiitem
label::English: What are the priority Non-Food Item needs of the household?
hint::English: The respondent should provide their main non-food item need only. If the HH feels they have no needs, select the 'No NFI needs' option
Question: F.2.1

name: prioritynfiitemwhy
label::English: If there are NFI needs, why does the household need these?
Question: F.2.1.1

name: prioritynfiitemaccess
label::English: How does your household typically access NFIs?
Question: F.2.2

name: fuelcookingheating
label::English: Does the household have sufficient fuel for cooking and heating needs, at the time of the assessment?
Question: F.3.1

name: typeshelterlive
label::English: What type of shelter does the household live in?
hint::English: Use observation if you can, to see if the shelter seems to fit the description
Question: F.4.1

name: shelterroomnumber
label::English: How many rooms are available in your house, in which household members live?
hint::English: The number of rooms should be realistic - If you are at the respondents house, observe to see if the number of rooms seems correct
constraint_message::English:
Constrain to 1 - 21.
The number you have entered is very high. Please check response with the respondent and adapt the answer.
Question: F.4.2

name: shelterdamaged
label::English: Has the household's shelter been damaged in the last six months due to the following?
hint::English: If host households say yes, make sure there has been a shock (such as natural disaster) - If there has not been a shock, select 'no' for this question
Question: F.4.3

name: shelterdamagedextent
label::English: If yes, what was the extent of the damage?
Question: F.4.3.1

name: shelterdamagedrepairs
label::English: Have you been able to make repairs to your shelter?

name: shelterdamagedrepairswhyno
label::English: If no, why were you unable to make these repairs?

name: separatelivingmen
label::English: Does the house have separate living spaces for men?
hint::English: This means a place for only men to sleep within the house
Question: F.5.1

name: separatelivingwomen
label::English: Does the house have separate living spaces for women?
hint::English: This means a place for only women to sleep within the house
Question: F.5.2

name: separatelivingchildren
label::English: Does the house have separate living spaces for children?
hint::English: This means a place for only children to sleep within the house
Question: F.5.3

name: reasonnoseparateliving
label::English: If any group does not have separate living space, what is the main reason for this?
Question: F.5.4

name: drinkingwatersource
label::English: Which type of drinking water source is MOST used by the household?
hint::English: This should be the MAIN water source used for the most water by the household for drinking
Question: K.1.1

name: drinkingwatersourcesp
hint::English: This should be the MAIN water source used for the most water by the household for drinking

name: watersourcesdamaged
label::English: Have any water sources in your community been damaged in the last six months?
Question: K1.2

name: watersourcesrepaired
label::English: If damaged, have water sources since been repaired?
Question: K.1.2.1

name: sizewatercontainer
label::English: What is the size of water container your household uses, in litres?
hint::English: If the respondent says ""other"" make sure the container size seems realistic - most are 10 or 20 litres.
Question: K.2.1

name: numberwatercontainer
label::English: How many containers of water are used on average every day by the household, for all uses?
hint::English: If the number is very high or very low, check the answer with the respondent
Question: K.2.2

name: itemsaccess
label::English: Which of the following items do household members have access to…
hint::English: Select all that apply - Allow none to be selected
Question: K.3.1

name: typelatrines
label::English: What type of latrines have been most commonly used by the household members in the last 30 days
Question: K.4.1

name: gendreseparatelatrines
label::English: For all latrine options, are the latrines separated for males and females?
Question: K.4.1.1

name: feellesssafemen
label::English: Do men in the household feel less safe in any of the following?
hint::English:
Select all that apply. 
If there HH members do not feel insecure, select ""do not feel insecure""
constraint_message::English: If the respondent chooses ""Do not feel insecure"" then no other answer option should be possible.
Question: J.2.1.1

name: feellesssafewomen
label::English: Do women in the household feel less safe in any of the following?
hint::English:
Select all that apply. 
If there HH members do not feel insecure, select ""do not feel insecure""
constraint_message::English: If the respondent chooses ""Do not feel insecure"" then no other answer option should be possible.
Question: J.2.1.2

name: greaterconcern
label::English: Do you have greater concern for children in the household in any of the following?
hint::English:
Select all that apply. 
If there HH members do not feel insecure, select ""do not feel insecure""
constraint_message::English: If the respondent chooses ""Do not feel insecure"" then no other answer option should be possible.
Question: J.2.1.3

name: adultprotectionincidents
label::English: Are you aware of any of the following protection incidents against adults occuring in your community in the past 30 days?
constraint: not(selected(., 'notaware') and (selected(., 'violence') or selected(., 'genderbasedviolence') or selected(., 'legaljusticerestrictions') or selected(., 'libertyissues') or selected(., 'housinglandpropertyconcerns') or selected(., 'restrictionsonaccessserv') or selected(., 'civildocumentationissues') ))
Question: J.2.2.1

name: childrenprotectionincidents
label::English: Are you aware of any of the following protection incidents against children occuring in your community in the past 30 days?
constraint: not(selected(., 'notaware') and (selected(., 'violence') or selected(., 'genderbasedviolence') or selected(., 'legaljusticerestrictions') or selected(., 'libertyissues') or selected(., 'housinglandpropertyconcerns') or selected(., 'restrictionsonaccessserv') or selected(., 'civildocumentationissues') ))
Question: J.2.2.2

name: adultsexposedviolence
label::English: Have any adults members of your household been exposed to at least one case of violence in the last six months?
hint::English:
This means have the participant or HH member themselves been affected by cases of violence in the last 6 months

This includes: Killing, physical assault, torture, maiming, psychological abuse, intimidation or harassment, forced labour, traditional justice (stoning, honour killin etc), physical punishment or forced begging)
Question: J.2.3

name: adultsexposedviolencewhere
label::English: If yes, where did it happen most recently?
Question: J.2.3.1

name: childexposedviolence
label::English: Have any child members of your household been exposed to at least one  case of violence in the last six months?
hint::English: This means have the participant or HH member themselves been affected by cases of violence in the last 6 months
Question: J.2.4

name: childexposedviolencewhere
label::English: If yes, where did it happen most recently?
Question: J.2.4.1

name: physicallyinjuredconflict
label::English: Have any household members been physically injured by conflict in the last six months?
Question: H1.1

name: physicallyinjurednaturaldisasters
label::English: Have any household members been physically injured by natural disaster in the last six months?
Question: H.1.2

name: receiveadecuatehealthcare
label::English: If yes, did the household member(s) receive adequate healthcare?
Question: H.1.3

name: injurieshealed
label::English: If yes, have the injuries healed?
Question: H.1.4

name: childrenviolence
label::English: Have you heard of any of the following happening to children in your community in the last six months, as a result of violence or conflict?:
Question: J.3.1

name: psychwellbeingadults
label::English: Are you aware of adults in your community in need of psychological or social wellbeing support because of the following:
constraint_message::English: If the respondent chooses ""No individuals in need of psychological or social wellbeing support"" then no other answer option should be possible.
Question: J.4.1

name: accesspsychsupportadults
label::English: if in need, do adults have access to this supportt?
Question: J.4.1.1

name: psychwellbeingchild
label::English: Are you aware of children in your community in need of psychological or social wellbeing support because of the following:
constraint_message::English: If the respondent chooses ""No individuals in need of psychological or social wellbeing support"" then no other answer option should be possible.
Question: J.4.2

name: accesspsychsupportchild
label::English: If in need, do children have access to this support?
Question: J.4.2.1

name: psychwellbeingunable
label::English: If no to adults or children, what is the most common reason those in need of this support unable to receive help in your community?
Question: J.5.1

name: priorityproblems
label::English: What are the top three priority problems/issues facing your community?
Question: J.6.1

name: mainpriorityneed
label::English: What is the household main priority need at the time of this assessment?
hint::English: Households will likely have many needs - They need to tell you the most important need
Question: L.3.1

name: receivedhumanitarianassistance
label::English: Has the household received any humanitarian assistance in the last six months?
Question: L.1.1

name: reasonnotreceiveassistance
label::English: For those that said no, what was the main reason you did  not receive any assistance?
Question: L.1.1.1

name: assistancereceived
label::English: For those that said yes, what types of assistance has the household received in the last six months?
hint::English: List all of the type of assistance received by the HH recently
Question: L.1.1.2

name: whatextentassistanceenable
label::English: For households that received humanitarian assistance in the last six months, to what extent did this assistance enable you to meet your needs during the month it was received?
Question: L.1.1.3

name: methodreceivingassistance
label::English: For households that have a need, what would be the preferred method for receiving assistance?
hint::English: Please reiterate that this will not directly lead to assistance, but will inform strategies
Question: L.4.1

name: complaintmechanisms
label::English: Is the household aware of any feedback or complaint mechanisms, to reach aid providers about community needs or assistance received?
Question: L.2.1

name: waycommunicatingproviders
label::English: If yes, what is the preferred way of communicating with aid providers about community needs or assistacne received?
Question: L.2.1.1

name: methodcommunicating
label::English: Why is this the preferred method of communicating with aid providers?
Question: L.2.1.2
